headline.main: Rwanda Ex-Mayors Suspected of Roles in Genocide Go on Trial

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject

snippet: Proceedings began in Paris against two former mayors accused of orchestrating and taking part in the mass killing of Tutsi refugees and moderate Hutu in 1994.
lead_paragraph: Proceedings began in Paris against two former mayors accused of orchestrating and taking part in the mass killing of Tutsi refugees and moderate Hutu in 1994.
